title: Russia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, summon a blizzard for the night. (2 uses)
- Roleblock a player.
- Coldsnap. (Costs 4 gold.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Blizzards prevent all players from visiting other players more than two houses away.
- Blizzards do not affect yourself, other Civilizations, or any roles relating to ice or snow.
- You may roleblock and coldsnap in the same night.
- During a Blizzard, if you perform the factional kill it is an Unstoppable attack.
- Detection Immunity

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were ambushed by a Russian cossack.” (Factional Kill)
“They fell victim to the Russian winter.” (Coldsnap)
“A blizzard is forming. You can hardly see!” (Blizzard forming, start of night)

desc:
Post 2132
*“Destiny may ride with us today, but there is no reason for it to interfere with lunch.” -Peter the Great*
